search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Intaker (intaker.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Unfortunately, I couldn't find the direct URL to the official pricing page for Intaker on their website. You may want to navigate the site at [Intaker.com](https://www.intaker.com) or contact their support for assistance.

extracted_content.content:
Law Firm Marketing Technology to Make You Stand Out.
----------------------------------------------------

**Website chat**, **two-way texting**, **follow-up automation**, **client intake** and **lead management** built for forward looking law firms.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 1: Yale's headshot](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/yale.jpg)

“The switch to Intaker has been great. So far, the client interaction seems to be smooth and leads are coming and scheduling.”

**Yale Spector**  
The Spector Law Group  
Personal Injury

![Image 2: Charlotte's headshot](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/charlotte.jpg)

“We love the program. LOVE love it.”

‍

**Charlotte Christian**  
Charlotte Christian Law, P.C.  
Family Law

![Image 3: John's headshot](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/john_p_500.jpg)

“That’s definitely an impressive increase in activity over what we had gotten. Good job. You delivered on your promise”

**John Razumich**  
Razumich & Associates, P.C.  
Criminal Defense

[![Image 4](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Intaker-Logo.svg)](https://www.intaker.com/home/index.html)

[![Image 5](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Intaker-Logo.svg)](https://www.intaker.com/home/index.html)

Empathy,  
Automated.

![Image 6: A picture showing two hands coming together](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Optimized-62016a0ef5a81a52b6f745fc_Hands.jpeg)

Legal Chatbot
-------------

Our website chat feature includes 1400+ built-in chat scripts for every legal case type. Personalize everything for your law firm's needs.

Highlight

Interactive Video
-----------------

Leave a positive long-lasting first impression with interactive video.

![Image 7: A lady in Intaker chat widget](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/output-onlinepngtools-1.png)

![Image 8: Intaker call widget](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Call-p-1080_1.png)

Highlight

Live Call Connect & Click-to-Call Widget
----------------------------------------

Turn chat leads into inbound phone calls with Call-Connect. Boost daily phone calls with Intaker’s user friendly click-to-call widget.

Highlight

Upload Files in Chat
--------------------

Users can directly upload documents like evidence and photos straight from their phone to the chat.

![Image 9: Upload a document in chat widget](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Upload_12x-p-1080_1.png)

![Image 10: An icon showing matter qualification](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Matter.svg)

Matter Qualifier

![Image 11: An icon showing multiple languages](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Language.svg)

Multiple Languages

![Image 12: An icon showing geo-location](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Geo.svg)

Geo-Fence for Jurisdiction Area

![Image 13: An icon showing Goofge my Business](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/google.svg)

Google my Business

![Image 14: An icon showing calendar](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Calendar.svg)

Self Schedule Consultations

![Image 15: An icon showing chat](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Chat.svg)

Instant Confirmation SMS

By the Numbers

Built-in case types

People served

1400

1M+

Text Messaging for Law Firms
----------------------------

Be present where your audience responds the fastest to increase your overall lead connection rate.

![Image 16: A picture showing two-way texting](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Text-22x.png)

### Two-Way Texting

Send and receive text messages on your Intaker dashboard from anywhere with wifi.

![Image 17: A picture showing how text templates using dynamic fields to automate writing text messages](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/SmS-New2x.png)

### Texting Templates

Efficiently draft personable messages, e.g. asking for reviews, with powerful texting templates.

![Image 18: A picture showing user headshots around a text message](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Multi-text2x.png)

### Team  
Collaboration

Utilize one text enabled phone number to collaborate and respond to messages as a team.

Client Intake and Lead Management for Law Firms  

--------------------------------------------------

Manage leads, set reminders, log calls, and follow up in one convenient location. Integrate any CRM to stay organized.  

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 19: dial pad icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/dialpad_white_24dp.svg)

Log Activities  
(e.g. calls)

![Image 20: check mark icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/task_alt_white_24dp.svg)

Assign Tasks & Reminders

![Image 21: Users icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/people_alt_white_24dp.svg)

Seamless Team Collaboration

![Image 22: Description icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/description_white_24dp.svg)

Take Notes

![Image 23: Filter icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/filter_alt_white_24dp.svg)

Filter Leads with Various Attributes

![Image 24: Lead status icon](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/dashboard_customize_white_24dp.svg)

Lead Status & Custom Fields

![Image 25: A workflow sequence that shows a series of text messages, emails and manual tasks](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Seq-32x.png)

Workflow Sequences
------------------

Following up with leads is no lawyer's favorite part of running a law firm but plays a key role in maximizing revenue. Intaker sequences are as powerful as an army of receptionists without costing nearly as much.

1

### Follow-up Automation

Automate sending a sequence of personalized follow-up emails and text messages to remind leads to take action, e.g., calling you back or self-scheduling an appointment.

2

### Task  
Automation

Automate reminding team members to take important actions as part of your internal workflow, e.g., attempting an intake call or asking for a document.

3

### Powerful  
Reporting

Take advantage of sequence reporting to monitor performance and make adjustments to maximize the effectiveness of automated workflows.

![Image 26: An icon showing email connectivity](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Connected-Emails.svg)

Connect Multiple Emails

![Image 27: An icon showing a user](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Personal.svg)

Personalized Emails & Texts

![Image 28: An icon showing a spam email](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Spam.svg)

Spam Prevention

![Image 29: An icon showing an unsubscribed email](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Unsub.svg)

Auto Unsubscribe

![Image 30: An icon showing stop feature](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Stop.svg)

Autostop by User Action

![Image 31: An icon showing a phone](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Call.svg)

Local Phone Number

"Aside from the increase in conversion rate we’ve seen from Intaker’s technology, their lower, fixed-rate fees have saved our clients tens of thousands of dollars over the last 10 months”

**Bo Royal**  
CEO & Co-Founder of Pareto Legal

![Image 32: Bo's headshot](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Bo-ROyal-1.jpeg)

Intaker Integrations

### You are in great company

![Image 33: Zapier logo](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Zapier.png)

Zapier

Google Analytics

Google my Business

![Image 36: Clio logo](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/images.png)

Clio

![Image 37: Salesforce Logo](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/SalesForce.png)

Salesforce

![Image 38: Filevine logo](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Filevine_Square_Logo.png)

Filevine

![Image 39: Calendly logo](https://www.intaker.com/home/images/Calendly.png)

Calendly

**& More**

Ready to dive in? Let’s start together.
---------------------------------------

For any questions about Template, please consult our help center. Reach out to us about anything you couldn't find there.

€ 149 one-off payment

--------------------------------

What's included

Build CSS grid–powered layouts visually

Responsive images

Law Firm marketing technology to make lawyers stand out. Convert your law firm’s website traffic into happy clients with Intaker's state-of-the-art automation tools.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The pricing includes a one-time payment for unlimited access to all products for one year.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Yearly access to all products with training and onboarding included.
features: Design and develop at the same time
